name: Xploit
overview: X-ploit is 2D side-scrolling action game with action set in future - mankind successfully defended against alien emperor, but people were turned into strange creatures. The player controls a green ball with feet, eyes and nose, named Spunky, who wants to destroy alien emperor. The game has simple rules - Spunky goes straightforward, jumps over holes and other obstacles, and collect various bonuses. He can shoot to destroy enemies and obstacles - but he has limited ammo. Spunky has small helicopter to fly, but fuel is also limited. Like in first Super Mario Bros. he can't go back (left).
